summary: Test suite that validates Dask DataFrame’s CSV reading and writing functionality across a wide range of scenarios, including block size inference, compression handling, dtype inference, column selection, header parsing, and edge‑case behaviours.
business_intent: Guarantee that CSV I/O works correctly and efficiently in distributed data pipelines, providing confidence that Dask can reliably ingest and export CSV data with the same semantics as pandas while supporting large‑scale and varied file configurations.
